name: ISO8601DateFormatter
desc: A formatter that converts between dates and their ISO 8601 string representations.

items.name: var formatOptions: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options
items.desc: Options for generating and parsing ISO 8601 date representations. See ISO8601DateFormatter.Options for possible values.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone!
items.desc: The time zone used to create and parse date representations. When unspecified, GMT is used.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes an ISO 8601 date formatter with default format, time zone, and options.

items.name: func string(from: Date) -> String
items.desc: Creates and returns an ISO 8601 formatted string representation of the specified date.

items.name: func date(from: String) -> Date?
items.desc: Creates and returns a date object from the specified ISO 8601 formatted string representation.

items.name: class func string(from: Date, timeZone: TimeZone, formatOptions: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options) -> String
items.desc: Creates a representation of the specified date with a given time zone and format options.

items.name: struct ISO8601DateFormatter.Options
items.desc: Options used to generate and parse ISO 8601 date representations.
